title: Trust in online customer reviews 2014 to 2018
summary: This grouped bar chart has 6 categories for the x axis of Response representing 2014, 2015, 2016, 2017, and 2018.
The highest category is found at Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic with a mean value of 25.2.
The second highest category is found at Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read with a mean value of 22.0.

data.Response: Yes if I believe the reviews are authentic
Yes for some types of businesses no for others
Yes if there are multiple customer reviews to read
No I am often skeptical about online reviews
No I don't trust reviews at all

gold: This statistic compares consumers trust in online reviews compared to personal recommendations . During the October 2018 survey it was found that 19 percent of respondents trusted online reviews if they believed them to be authentic .
